subtitle: Many people are in an excited mood to chase after some "sensation" of Awakening Kundalini
even if they don't know what it is yet, because you cannot know something until
you have experienced it and further, even when we begin to taste it there is much to reflect on and
comprehend we're going to look at something very specific about the nature and true
depths of Kundalini that exoteric teachings do not know... be careful when you listen to
information about Kundalini and people talking about it in an ambiguous and
sensationalist way - when we use our intellect to study Kundalini we should be very precise
we should seek to know exactly what we are talking about... there's a beautiful saying
in the Gnostic teachings - "be like a lemon" because the taste of a lemon is very exact,
very distinct, and when you have distinction and exact conceptualization then exact understanding
will flow from your inquiry, it will flow from your meditation, and it will override
possible unconscious misunderstandings that arise from the ignorance of vague thinking
now what we're going to look at here may seem discouraging to some because what we're going
to see is how profoundly colossal the nature of Kundalini Awakening really is the true gravity of
it we're like ants trying to move a mountain many people underestimate this topic like it's a child
toy this is very popular on YouTube; to see it as something easy to achieve but it is not and we're
going to see how it is not a simple-minded linear process of going from the root of the
spine to the top of the crown if it were that simple it would not be a mystical esoteric
topic... it is ignorant to see Kundalini as some kind of simple tool like a light switch with an
on and of button -- remember that which we call Kundalini is precisely your particular individual
Divine Mother who is with you always she is with everyone always no matter what no matter whether
we are conscious of it or not because she is our true mother in the spiritual world and she holds
profound love and also profound intelligence multi-dimensional intelligence and just like
a true mother if an individual does not want to awaken their Consciousness and they want to live
un consciously our mother will not stop us because she loves us and she cares about us it is a type
of love that most do not understand when religious people say God will forgive any type of Sinner the
truth of that is precisely the aspect of God that is the Divine Mother who forgives and helps us no
matter what so remember we are talking about the nature of the Divine Mother Kundalini that is the
Divine Mother energy as this serpent energy that lays within us in our spine our nervous system
you can see it as a winged serpent, you can see it as Isis, you can see it as Mother Mary, it doesn't
matter: it is a reality of our Consciousness that holds great power and our relationship with it is
precisely connected to our Primal Root Force; our Sexual Energy and the ascent of this energy
is precisely connected to the transmutation of that energy everyone has a relationship
with their Divine Mother whether it be neutral positive negative each to their own has their own
relationship... and clairvoyants can see or observe people and understand quickly
what kind of relationship that person has with their own Divine Mother which is not
just connected to their own individual Divine Mother but a relationship with the Universal
Force of this energy... she has many forms Cosmic, terrestrial, she appears also as our
physical mother who gave birth to us ~ many forms so when one decides to truly turn their attention
away from the attachments and identifications with the material world of material Consciousness and
instead directs their attention inwards towards the Awakening of Consciousness to dissolving the
mechanical psychological patterns of ego making the unconscious conscious transmuting Sexual
Energy developing virtues such as compassion and love attaining degrees of Enlightenment
then when our inner World becomes conscious in this way illuminated purified it is then when
the force of Kundalini our divine mother helps us to truly transform through giving us the Vigor,
the Vitality of universal Cosmic Love in our hearts showing us the power of compassion
and sacrifice she shows us in subtle ways the meaning of everything we are going through on
our path in life and she helps us in our Ascent during our hardest and darkest moments and as
an effect of that, she also enables our natural Occult Powers such as telepathy astral travel,
higher intuition, clairvoyance, clairaudience, the experience of Samadhi and much more it is
never the Kundalini that causes suffering but suffering is always caused by the ego
and our attachments to Ego and the pain of truly letting it go, and letting it vanish, letting it
dissolve... now don't overthink the following it's just considerations for reflection and deeper
meditation when people say they have awakened Kundalini 99% of them are sincerely mistaken
what happens is people do certain spiritual practices such as pranama or meditation and they
have this or that extra-sensory perception and because of that they believe they have awakened
Kundalini and they go around telling others that their Kundalini is awakened based on a
past experience based on a past memory but having this Force truly permanently rooted within us is
one thing and gaining a tiny spark during a mere moment of meditation is another people who are
truly actively working with the Divine Mother Kundalini never say that they have awakened
Kundalini because they are very aware of how easy it is to fall into identification with
ego... it is Pride which gets in the way of most people on this path if you think you're awakened
you're probably not a condition for raising Kundalini is humbleness Master Jesus said:
wherever you go, humble yourself and choose the lowest seat - if you do so,
you will be exalted to a higher seat, but if you choose to place yourself on the highest seat,
then you will be humbled, or in other words humiliated, in order to be taught the virtue of
humility... in deeper understanding this means that in your spiritual work in your
path you should focus on the deepest and most difficult attachments to Ego that you
have and that is when Divinity that's when the Christ, the Christic Force,
helps you... you see everyone is busy looking up at Heaven, but if you want to get to Heaven
you have to humble your head and look down at Hell - because the mess you've made is below
Kundalini is always about taking personal responsibility for your own psychological
transformation so why is Kundalini much bigger than we realize to explain this in
short Kundalini is not raised once it does not Ascend or awaken once there are in reality seven
Kundalinis... seven completely different types of Kundalini: each one being raised one at a time one
after the other, this is a profoundly complex process that can only be ultimately understood,
it can only ultimately be comprehended in the internal worlds in the superior dimensions of
Consciousness - in one's own direct experience in the path of initiation... the process cannot
be understood merely with words or merely with the mind it is a secret path for each individual
because as Kundalini ascends up each of the 33 vertebrae there are tests and trials that the
individual goes through in the inner worlds these are not tests like punishments but requirements
of purification of certain internal elements that cannot exist within us if we want our
Consciousness to awaken so to clarify Kundalini is raised seven times because there are seven
bodies to awaken and each body has its own nervous system its own spine its own 33 vertebrae this is
energetic it is real but these bodies exist on another dimension of existence another dimension
of Consciousness they cannot be understood on the dimension of consciousness of the physical plane,
you are watching this video while your Consciousness is rooted in the physical
dimension of existence this makes this matter very difficult to talk about... very difficult
to grasp with the mind that is rooted in the material understanding of the world
so these bodies are also known as the existential bodies of the being or
Superior bodies or solar bodies and each one is awakened in the order of first, the physical body
second, the vital or etheric body
third, the astral body... fourth, the mental body
fifth, the causal body
sixth, the budhic body, and seventh the atmic body... in future videos we'll look more deeply
at each body and what dimension of Consciousness it encompasses but for now what we're emphasizing
here is that the process of creating these bodies is challenging and takes a long time
and especially so because we are unguided and we fall spiritually sexually emotionally mentally
through wrong actions false emotions illusions of the mind and what happens when you fall you
will undergo difficulties and challenges to do with things that you thought you had overcome
in the past but the truth is you didn't fully learn from it yet and that's why your Kundalini
couldn't continue being raised because there was a heaviness a lead of attachments that are
still pulling you down unobserved egos ignored psychological patterns that are conditioning
your State of Consciousness that you are yet to be aware of this is why tests in life are
necessary to show you what you are unaware of for this reason, we should be very grateful
for adversities and problems in life whatever it may be if there is even an ounce of resistance
in our moments of life -- that resistance, that problem, that ego contains a gift of light for
us to observe comprehend and transmute this is why self-observation, self-remembrance,
prayer meditation at every moment of life is crucial for Spiritual Awakening to go deeper
as discussed in previous videos such as the one on white Tantra and meditation on ego the
polarity of Kundalini the inversion of Kundalini is called the Kundabuffer and the Kundabuffer is
the home to our psychological Darkness our egos to understand this more in terms of Kundalini
Awakening physiologically the atoms or vibrations of the Kundabuffer exist physiologically and
energetically within the tailbone which is where tremendous amounts of energy is locked
laying dormant asleep because all of that energy is being used to keep the unconsciousness of our
infernal world of unconscious dreams alive - the process of Awakening Kundalini is a
process of gradually liberating the energy of Consciousness that is trapped in our tailbone,
or coccyx, which is done by Illuminating and dying to our unconscious psychological patterns that are
keeping us asleep from moment to moment the more we stop leaking energy in the tailbone the more
we save energy and get the opportunity to raise it up the spine for the activation of our higher
bodies for this transmutation meditation and white Tantra is necessary now a question that
some may ask is don't we already have some of these bodies such as the astral body indeed we
do possess other bodies already but they are lunar inverted and they have a mechanical nature because
they exist within the world of the Kundabuffer for example everyone has a lunar astral body and
it can be observed every time we go to sleep through white Tantra or Alchemy we learn to
build the solar bodies including the solar astral body and as each one is born we also raise the
Kundalini of each one... this is also related to Yesod on the tree of Life the ninth sphere or the
Gate of Eden -- as you can see on the diagram, it is the sexual center of Kabbalah the vital body,
that first needs to be purified and illuminated before proceeding to the higher bodies so you
see currently our lunar bodies exist in the lower Fifth Dimension or what we can call the
fourth dimension because for example the lunar astral body is garbed under the vital body of
the inferior dimensions of the kundabuffer and it is through transmutation that we find the
transformation of this subconscious world we begin to transform it and refine it this is why we said
earlier be precise in your spiritual seeking seek to be very accurate and exact about what what you
want because that will determine the way that you transform your inner world and gradually you will
find higher perceptions of Consciousness into the objective world of the Kundalini and more
powers and higher Insight naturally come with the solar bodies because the solar bodies are
based in The Fifth Dimension; meaning an objective space which exists Beyond time and space and when
you are in a dimension of Consciousness that is beyond time and space you are not limited
by time nor space and that gives you access to the freedom of perception itself it is a place
of Consciousness where we can perceive objective reality as opposed to the subconscious infernal
regions of this sleeping lower Fifth Dimension or fourth dimension or also known as The Abyss;
this dimension which is related with time, memory, subconsciousness, subjectivity,
dreams... these lower dimensions are not to be condemned, but are to be illuminated;
we have to bring Consciousness to our unconsciousness - that is the only way to
grow in an authentic way spiritually it is not through attainment of new Concepts or beliefs
but through Illuminating the unconsciousness: that is how an individual grows... so in this
way the lower Fifth Dimension and fourth Dimensions serve as a bridge to the higher
dimensions of Reality by developing our solar astral body through meditation self-observation
and the transmutation of our Sexual Energy we can awaken our Consciousness and explore the
higher dimensions of existence it is through this inner work that we can strive to transcend the
limitations of the lunar bodies and awaken to our true spiritual potential so always keep in
mind that if you're Awakening Consciousness just for the sensationalism of Kundalini Awakening then
you won't make as much progress remember the saying Kundalini Rises according to the merits
of the heart according to the language of the heart according to your relationship with your
own individual particular Divine Mother your relationship with divine unconditional love
for all beings and all of existence the more of that that you can attain the more that the
scales of Karma and Dharma will balance in your way and allow you and open you up to
these [Higher] Mysteries that we're exploring here for you to comprehend yourself in your own direct
experience this process this path and this Force, Kundalini, it is all to do with your
own [Higher] Being, your own intuition, nobody else can really tell you how to do it you have
to follow your own Being and you have to learn how to follow your own intuition which is tricky
because the ego always thinks it's right and the ego will always try to feed us intuition
but there is a way to Listen to True Intuition so we all have to follow our Being which is based in
the Vertical Dimension of Life and therefore there is no set amount of time that Kundalini
awakens to... some people say that it takes 7 years for each body or something like this
no it happens according to the Vertical Dimension of your Consciousness which is
not set in time it is set according to to "the merits of your heart" according to your inner
purification so wherever you are right now in your spiritual path is exactly where you're meant to
be because that is where this Force has put you it has put you here and now wherever you are continue
with perseverance no matter how difficult things get those who make conscious efforts are sure to
succeed ask for help from your own Divine Mother Kundalini and you will receive it...
